params.forwarder: The address of the trusted forwarder for meta-transactions

params.cliffDuration: Initial cliff period before tokens unlock
params.merkleRoot: The Merkle root for verifying claims
params.owner: The owner of the airdrop contract

returns.airdropAddress: The address of the deployed airdrop contract
returns.strategyAddress: The address of the deployed vesting strategy

params.distributionCap: Maximum tokens that can be distributed (0 for no cap)
params.merkleRoot: The Merkle root for verifying push distributions
params.owner: The owner/admin who can push tokens

returns._0: The address of the deployed push airdrop contract

params.merkleRoot: The Merkle root for verifying claims
params.owner: The owner of the airdrop contract

returns._0: The address of the deployed airdrop contract
